title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
overview: In this fun and action-packed series, Hello Kitty stars as the friendliest face in Cherry Town â€” a small-town hero who will stop at nothing to help a friend in need and get them smiling. Whether she's helping someone overcome a fear, share with a friend, or find the confidence to try something new, Kitty uses sprinkles of kindness, oodles of heart and a dose of bow power!
